item.title: #it @ 1501660744693260291
item.description:
Finalmente, finalmente (finalmente!) la Valle d'Aosta ha corretto i numeri sugli immunodepressi in regione.
Adesso sono 800 (0.65% della popolazione) e non pi√π 14027 (11.32% della popolazione).
Incredibile, eh.
https://t.co/Qsq7nFLMsM https://t.co/NgnFnZ7tOo

item.title: #en @ 1501620901082767367
item.description:
Misconceptions about preregistration üßµ:
1. Preregistration says nothing about the quality of decision-making. It just makes the timing and extent of analyses transparent. Likewise, open data/materials says nothing about the quality of the data/materials, just the availability.

item.title: #en @ 1501583582661431304
item.description: I'm looking forward to my lecture tomorrow. It's about NYC crime data, yes, and we will go through a bunch of that stuff (like the whole "solving crimes" thing) but it'll also explore what does open data mean for abolitionists and should we really be demanding more policing data.

item.title: #en @ 1501582971102445578
item.description: There's no unused beige land in the UK we can build railways on: re-opening old lines & building new ones means a change in land use. There are >52,000 ancient woodlands in England and they're scattered around like confetti. See this interactive map. /5 https://t.co/waNa6rLyyI

item.title: #en @ 1501576823871881223
item.description:
Dear @Europarl_EN Members: Please, urge the @EU_Commission to immediately implement the Open Data Directive, ensuring that the rules requiring full transparency of company ownership are in place ASAP.
This is crucial in exposing assets & money of Russian oligarchs in the EU.

item.title: #en @ 1500958350292307969
item.description:
Excited to (finally!) share that I'm consulting to @USAFacts. I have a lot of respect for their work on helping constituents and governments access accurate data trends. Thrilled to work with the team!
Working on new programs to expand open data access in the USA!

item.title: #en @ 1500951752107073539
item.description:
The LooksRare Story has brought out an immense amount of data driven insights that have been negative for the project.
Whether you like it or not, in web3 you can't hide the truth.
Bullish on objective reporting, citizen journalism and open data for everyone. https://t.co/tuuBggz8xS

item.title: #en @ 1500944129437716480
item.description:
Hello, community!
Open Data Protocol core beliefs are: - Users own their data, not mega-corporations - Decentralization is key to our future - Security & privacy of our users are of utmost importance - Freedom of speech means what it states
#OPENDATA $OPEN #BNB #BSC #CRYPTO
